name: Draw Stickman Tank
description:
You can draw tanks for your stickman soldiers and event control them! Draw uniqie machines, explore new lands, conquer enemies!

Made by Angry Rectangle & Ringri (team: "Большая коллекция супов"), Angry Rectangle - Programmer, Ringri - Artist

How to play:

  1. Press on armor/wheel/gun button.
  2. Draw all parts
  3. Start game
  4. Left tap for backward movement, right tap for forward movement
  5. Fight!
